page.title: 06Games Families Leisure
page.content:
At school I play Stuck in the Mud and It. At home I play Catch in the garden and football with Mummy and Clair. Inside at night I play Draughts, Chess, Fantasy Forest, Pairs and Snap. Sometimes I play Witches and Wizards. I often play Catch with Simon and we catch the girls and Simon puts them into his pretend oven and cooks them, then he pretends to eat them.(James)
I like playing Pontoon with Mum, Dad and Matthew. Matthew doesn't know how to play it so Dad helps him and we play Bingo and Snakes and Ladders. I like playing football and cricket in the field opposite my house.(Daniel)
